content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Cable Factory at Position(x=2.5, y=17.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Cable factory input chest at Position(x=2.5, y=17.5)
• New factory burner inserter at Position(x=3.5, y=17.5) placed using direction RIGHT  
   – Neighbours include a burner inserter at Position(x=2.5, y=16.5) and an assembling machine at Position(x=1.5, y=19.5)

### Belt Depot at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Wooden chest serving as the belt depot at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5) (crafted and successfully placed in Step 214)
• Dedicated transport belt segment adjacent to the depot at Position(x=4.5, y=15.5) (placed in Step 215)
• Depot burner inserter at Position(x=3.5, y=14.5) placed using direction UP (providing a pickup at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5); placed in Step 216)

### Extraction System at Position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Extraction system burner inserter at Position(x=-3.5, y=27.5) with its drop position at Position(x=-3.5, y=28.5)
• Defined intermediate waypoints for belt routing at Position(x=0.0, y=26.0) and Position(x=1.0, y=22.0)

--------------------------------------------------------

ERROR TIPS

• Transport Belt Connection Target Error  
  When connecting transport belts (observed in Steps 210, 211, 213, 214, 215, 216, and 217), the target is mistakenly interpreted as a Prototype.SteamEngine.  
  → Tip: Ensure the target entity is not a steam engine by adding an inserter that feeds items into it, and then use that inserter as the connection endpoint.

• Placement Range Error  
  An error occurred when placing a wooden chest at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5) because the player was too far away (as in Step 212).  
  → Tip: Move sufficiently close (within the maximum placement distance of 10 units) to the target position before attempting to place an entity.

• Undefined Variable Error  
  An error (“NameError: name 'target_chest' is not defined”) was raised due to referencing an undefined variable (Step 212).  
  → Tip: Verify that all variables are properly defined and that naming conventions are consistent before use.

• Inventory Shortage Error  
  In Step 213, placing the wooden chest failed due to a missing inventory item.  
  → Tip: Check and, if necessary, craft or collect the required items prior to placement attempts.
